summary: Feature request to propagate OpenTelemetry context to local activities in the TypeScript SDK. Currently, only non-local activities and child workflows have traces attached to the workflow's span, creating inconsistency in observability.
userImpact: Users cannot effectively trace and monitor local activity execution through OpenTelemetry, limiting visibility into workflow execution.
rootCause: OpenTelemetry context is not being propagated to local activities while it is for non-local activities and child workflows.
resolutionDetails: SDK tracing support is being removed; this feature request became moot as internal SDK traces are being deprecated. However, user-provided traces should still work.
keyQuote: This is true for internal SDK traces, not user traces. I reopened this issue.
